snippet: HARRISON--Nora M.,on January 29, 2016 of Douglas Manor, NY. Loving mother of Robert, Lynn, and David. Dear grandmother of seven and great-grandmother of six. Loving sister of the late Jane. Calling hours at The Fairchild Chapel, 1570 Northern Blvd., Manhasset on Monday 3-5 and 7-9pm. Funeral Mass Tuesday, 10:30am at St. Anastasia RC Church (corner of Northern Blvd and 245th St.), Douglaston. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to: info@lighthouseguild.org. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HARRISON, NORA M.
